member.name: D2D1_CHANGE_TYPE
member.summary: Describes flags that influence how the renderer interacts with a custom vertex shader.

member.name: D2D1_CHANGE_TYPE.D2D1_CHANGE_TYPE_PROPERTIES
member.summary: The properties of the effect changed.

member.name: D2D1_CHANGE_TYPE.D2D1_CHANGE_TYPE_GRAPH
member.summary: The effect’s transform graph has changed. This happens only when an effect supports a variable input count.
